title: go get for git repositories does leave the checkout on a branch
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

go get github.com/davecheney/gmx
cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/davecheney/gmx
git branch

What is the expected output?

% git branch
* master

What do you see instead?

% git branch
* (no branch)
  master

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux/amd64

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

Go1

Please provide any additional information below.

Also discussed here

https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/iIRVFyWM9lw/discussion

This behaviour is not consistent with the behaviour of hg repositories that are go
get'ed.
